<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find a Log by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/logs/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Find a log by ID.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Messaging_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Unique ID of the log","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"A unique identifier for the log"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"from":{"type":"string","description":"The origin phone number.","example":"+12065551212"},"to":{"type":"string","description":"The destination phone number.","example":"+12065553434"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"The status of the message.","example":"sent"},"direction":{"type":"string","description":"The direction of the message.","example":"inbound"},"kind":{"type":"string","description":"The kind of message.","example":"sms"},"source":{"type":"string","description":"Source of this log entry.","example":"laml"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of this log entry.","example":"laml_message"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"URL for the resource associated with this log entry (if available)"},"number_of_segments":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of segments.","example":1},"charge":{"type":"number","description":"The charge in dollars.","example":"0.01"},"charge_details":{"type":"array","description":"Details on charges associated with this log.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description for this charge."},"charge":{"type":"number","description":"Charged amount."}}},"example":[]}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
